Uses of Class
com.fuse.ui.TouchReceiver

  • Packages that use TouchReceiver 
    Package Description
    com.fuse.ui  
    com.fuse.ui.extensions  

    • Uses of TouchReceiver in com.fuse.ui

      Subclasses of TouchReceiver in com.fuse.ui 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  EventNode
      Custom Node type that extends the Node class with two events; drawEvent and updateEvent, which are triggered in respectively the draw() and update(float dt) methods.
      class  ImageNode 
      class  LambdaNode
      Custom Node type that extends the Node class with a setDrawFunc and setUpdateFunc which allows the user to use this node for any kind of custom behaviour.
      class  LineNode 
      class  Node
      Base class for scenegraph UI functionality, heavily inspired by the ofxInterface OpenFrameworks addon: https://github.com/galsasson/ofxInterface
      class  RectNode 
      class  TextNode 
      class  TouchManager 
      Methods in com.fuse.ui with parameters of type TouchReceiver 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      ExtensionBase Node.copyAllTouchEventsFrom(TouchReceiver source)
      Creates an extension that monitors the source for touch events and passed them on to this node These two methods create a circular dependency between Node and TouchEventForwarder, however they merely exist for providing an easy API
      ExtensionBase Node.stopCopyingAllTouchEventsFrom(TouchReceiver source)
